title: Specializations Configuration
description: Configuration for character specialization path type classifications, Corruption risk profiles, specialization definitions with display metadata, special resources, and ability tiers. Part of v0.17.4a (path types), v0.17.4b (definitions), and v0.17.4c (ability tiers).

pathTypes.description: Array of path type classifications for all 17 specializations.

definitions.description: Array of specialization definitions with display metadata, path type, parent archetype, unlock cost, and optional special resource for all 17 specializations.

pathTypeEntry.description: Path type classification for a single specialization, including its Corruption risk profile.

specializationId.description: The PascalCase identifier matching the SpecializationId enum value.

pathType.description: The path type classification: Coherent (stable reality) or Heretical (corrupted Aether).

corruptionRisk.description: Description of Corruption risk for Heretical paths, or null for Coherent paths.

oneOf.description: Corruption risk description for Heretical specializations.
Null for Coherent specializations with no Corruption risk.

definitionEntry.description: Complete specialization definition with display metadata, path classification, parent archetype, unlock cost, and optional special resource.

specializationId.description: The PascalCase identifier matching the SpecializationId enum value.

displayName.description: Human-readable display name, potentially with Old Norse diacritics.

tagline.description: Short evocative tagline summarizing the specialization identity.

description.description: Full lore description of the specialization.

selectionText.description: Second-person narrative text shown during character creation selection.

parentArchetype.description: The parent archetype this specialization belongs to.

pathType.description: The path type classification: Coherent (stable reality) or Heretical (corrupted Aether).

unlockCost.description: Progression Point cost to unlock. 0 for first specialization during character creation, 3 for additional specializations.

specialResource.description: Optional special resource definition unique to this specialization, or null for specializations without unique resources.

abilityTiers.description: Array of ability tiers for this specialization. Empty array if ability data is not yet configured. Typically contains 3 tiers when fully populated.

specialResourceEntry.description: Defines a special resource unique to a specialization, with range, starting value, and passive regen/decay behavior.

resourceId.description: Unique kebab-case identifier for this resource type (e.g., 'rage', 'block-charges').

displayName.description: Human-readable display name shown in UI (e.g., 'Rage', 'Block Charges').

maxValue.description: Maximum resource value. Must be greater than or equal to minValue.

startsAt.description: Starting value at combat start. Must be within [minValue, maxValue] range.

regenPerTurn.description: Passive regeneration amount per turn. 0 means no passive regeneration.

decayPerTurn.description: Passive decay amount per turn. 0 means no passive decay.

description.description: Flavor description of the resource's nature and purpose.

abilityTierEntry.description: Defines a tier of abilities within a specialization, including unlock requirements and contained abilities.

tier.description: Tier number (1, 2, or 3). Determines progression order and unlock requirements.

displayName.description: Human-readable display name for this tier (e.g., 'Primal Fury', 'Unleashed Beast').

unlockCost.description: Progression Point cost to unlock this tier. Standard: Tier 1 = 0, Tier 2 = 2, Tier 3 = 3.

requiresPreviousTier.description: Whether the previous tier must be unlocked first. False for Tier 1, true for Tier 2 and 3.

requiredRank.description: Minimum progression rank required. Standard: Tier 1 = 1, Tier 2 = 2, Tier 3 = 3.

abilities.description: Array of abilities available in this tier. Each tier contains 2-4 abilities.

abilityEntry.description: Defines an individual ability within a specialization tier, including mechanical properties like resource cost, cooldown, and Corruption risk.

abilityId.description: Unique kebab-case identifier for this ability (e.g., 'rage-strike', 'blood-frenzy'). Must be unique across all tiers within the specialization.

displayName.description: Human-readable display name shown in UI (e.g., 'Rage Strike', 'Blood Frenzy').

isPassive.description: True for passive abilities (always active once unlocked), false for active abilities (require manual activation).

resourceCost.description: Resource amount required to use. 0 for passive abilities or free active abilities.

resourceType.description: Resource type consumed (e.g., 'rage', 'stamina'). Empty string for abilities with no resource cost.

cooldown.description: Cooldown in turns between uses. 0 for no cooldown. Must be 0 for passive abilities.

corruptionRisk.description: Corruption risk amount when using this ability. 0 for Coherent path abilities or abilities without Corruption risk.
